title: Language Resources
description: Set of resources that can be used for learning programming

description.description: A brief description of the language and its uses

emoji.description: A Unicode emoji symbol or discord emoji ID to represent the resource, if applicable. The emoji must be part of the main DevDen server, which isn't great design but there's not really a better way of doing it.

resources.description: List of resources that can be used for learning / practicing the language

name.description: The official name of the resource

price.description: The price of the resource, if it has one. If the resource is free, leave empty

pros.description: Array of pros for using the resource, eg 'explains difficult concepts with good analogies'

cons.description: Array of cons for using the resource, eg 'only teaches the basics rather than more advanced concepts'
